title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Health Updates: veggies for the skin; garlic- a perfect food? <!--more--> garlic protects against hip osteoarthritis; adverse affects hair loss drugs.

Commentaries: Poverty in America; American fascism.
Jan Lundberg is an environmental activist of many years.
His former firm was well known for publishing the “bible of the oil industry.
” There he noticed the unsustainable consumption of highly polluting “unending” oil extraction, and eventually left the family business he was running.
He founded the Alliance for a Paving Moratorium and the Auto-Free Times magazine.
Discussing peak oil, climate, relocalizing economies, resisting the system, and the environmental movement.
www.culturechange.org
